[scar]program New;

DropTo(1,28)
end;
begin
dropal
end[/scar]

Failed when compiling Line 26: [Error] (28:1): Unknown identifier 'GameTab' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.scar

item.title: Wc plus drop v2.0
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

this is onli my 2cond script so dont hate me if it dont workâ€¦
drag the crosshair to the rs game thing and set up the colors and timethen start it and have fun

also no antirandoms

[scar]{///////////////////////////////////////////////////
||| || || || ||||||| ||||| |||||| |||||| //
|||| || || || || || || || || //
|| || || || || ||||| ||||| |||| ||||| //
|| |||| || || || || || || || //
|| ||| |||||| ||||||| ||||| |||||| ||||| //
}///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{.include SRL/SRL.scar} //
{woodcutter plus drop version 2.0} //
{set up lines 20-22} //
{set brightness to verry bright} //
{have ax weilded or in first inv spot} //
{before starting drag crosshair to the rs game screen}//
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure chop;
var x,y,firstcolor,inv,secondcolor,clicks:integer;
begin
repeat
/////////////////setup//////////////////////////////
firstcolor:=16284282;//first color of the tree. //
secondcolor:=4089454;//second color of the tree. //
clicks:=5000;//time to wait after clicks. //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////
///////////////do not tuch below////////////////////
inv:=3885652;
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,firstcolor,3, 3,515, 337))then
begin
mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
wait(clicks)
end else
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,secondcolor,3, 3,515, 337))then
begin
mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
wait(clicks)
end;
end;
until(not(findcolorspiral(x,y,inv,715, 440,715, 440)))
end;
procedure drop;
begin
mouse(585, 266,2,2,false)

mouse(587, 303,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(586, 301,2,2,false)

mouse(583, 344,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(585, 336,2,2,false)

mouse(588, 379,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(587, 374,2,2,false)

mouse(600, 412,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(587, 410,2,2,false)

mouse(583, 428,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(587, 445,2,2,false)

mouse(587, 430,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(628, 229,2,2,false)

mouse(623, 271,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(628, 265,2,2,false)

mouse(623, 308,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(627, 301,2,2,false)

mouse(608, 343,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(629, 338,2,2,false)

mouse(628, 380,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(628, 373,2,2,false)

mouse(623, 416,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(628, 408,2,2,false)

mouse(628, 428,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(669, 229,2,2,false)

mouse(661, 270,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(668, 265,2,2,false)

mouse(662, 308,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(667, 302,2,2,false)

mouse(667, 344,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(670, 337,2,2,false)

mouse(670, 380,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(669, 372,2,2,false)

mouse(664, 416,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(670, 410,2,2,false)

mouse(671, 427,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(671, 444,2,2,false)

mouse(676, 427,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(711, 228,2,2,false)

mouse(707, 272,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(712, 265,2,2,false)

mouse(689, 305,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(712, 301,2,2,false)

mouse(701, 342,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(712, 336,2,2,false)

mouse(695, 379,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(710, 373,2,2,false)

mouse(692, 416,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(712, 407,2,2,false)

mouse(706, 428,2,2,true)

///////////////////
mouse(710, 444,2,2,false)

mouse(703, 428,2,2,true)

///////////////////
end;
begin
repeat
chop
drop
until false;
end.[/scar]
